name: GameStop Military Discount
description: 10% off games, hardware, and collectibles for military
fullDescription: GameStop offers active and former military personnel 10% off new and pre-owned video games, hardware, accessories, and collectibles year-round.
whatTheyOffer:
- 10% off video games (new and pre-owned)
- 10% off gaming hardware and accessories
- 10% off collectibles
- Available in-store with valid ID
- Year-round discount
howToGetIt:
1. Visit any GameStop store
2. Present valid military ID at checkout
3. Active duty, veterans, retirees, and dependents eligible
4. Discount applied to eligible purchases
5. Some exclusions may apply
keywords: GameStop, military discount, veteran, 10% off, video games, gaming, consoles
